content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Load balancing for containerized ICAP scanners Implementing a load balancer for your Trend Vision One File Security Containerized Scanner provides several benefits: High Availability: Load balancers distribute traffic across multiple scanner instances, ensuring service continuity even if individual pods fail. Scalability: You can scale your scanner deployments while maintaining a single endpoint for clients. External Access: Load balancers provide a consistent external endpoint for ICAP clients outside your Kubernetes cluster. Traffic Management: You control how requests are distributed (for example round-robin, least connections) to optimize resource utilization.
